content.raw: the first version of code did exactly that, but I had forgotten that Detach disconnects the `OnUpdate` event. So you would have to save all the attachment info then re-connect to `OnUpdate` and then check in `OnUpdate` for cached Attach calls. It worked but it was much shorter to just lock the physics update mutex, so I opted for that
